0774754a49afc50e950e75a19a6eb4e86c6682b3.query:
WITH event_game_patch_response AS (
                    INSERT INTO event_game_vote (event_id, game_id, email, vote)
                        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)
                        ON CONFLICT (event_id, game_id, email) DO UPDATE SET vote = $4, last_modified = NOW()
                        RETURNING event_id, game_id, email, vote, vote_date, last_modified
                ) SELECT
                    steam_game.appid AS appid,
                    steam_game.name AS name,
                    steam_game.last_modified AS last_modified,
                    event_game.requested_at AS requested_at,
                    event_game.last_modified AS suggestion_last_modified,
                    self_vote.vote AS "self_vote: _",
                    CASE
                        WHEN self_vote.vote = 'yes'::vote THEN count(all_votes.*) + 1
                        ELSE count(all_votes.*) - 1
                    END AS votes
                FROM event_game
                INNER JOIN steam_game
                    ON event_game.game_id = steam_game.appid
                LEFT JOIN event_game_patch_response AS self_vote
                    ON event_game.event_id = self_vote.event_id
                    AND event_game.game_id = self_vote.game_id
                LEFT JOIN event_game_vote AS all_votes
                    ON event_game.event_id = all_votes.event_id
                    AND event_game.game_id = all_votes.game_id
                    AND all_votes.vote = 'yes'::vote
                WHERE event_game.event_id = $1
                AND event_game.game_id = $2
                GROUP BY steam_game.appid, steam_game.name, steam_game.last_modified, event_game.requested_at, event_game.last_modified, self_vote.vote

07e62b080405157fa37c8240129445380aee359b.query:
DELETE FROM invitation
        WHERE event_id = $1
        AND email = $2

16980e366e093f877be75c84720fde27c22f4634.query: SELECT id, created_at, last_modified, title, description, time_begin, time_end FROM event

2740aebba5f7844fff3844918f617ef2cf8d9a44.query:
SELECT
            steam_game.appid AS appid,
            steam_game.name AS name,
            steam_game.last_modified AS last_modified,
            event_game.requested_at AS requested_at,
            event_game.last_modified AS suggestion_last_modified,
            self_votes.vote AS "self_vote: _",
            count(all_votes.*) AS votes
        FROM event_game
        INNER JOIN steam_game
            ON event_game.game_id = steam_game.appid
        LEFT JOIN event_game_vote AS self_votes
            ON event_game.event_id = self_votes.event_id
            AND event_game.game_id = self_votes.game_id
            AND self_votes.email = $2
        LEFT JOIN event_game_vote AS all_votes
            ON event_game.event_id = all_votes.event_id
            AND event_game.game_id = all_votes.game_id
            AND all_votes.vote = 'yes'::vote
        WHERE event_game.event_id = $1
        GROUP BY steam_game.appid, steam_game.name, steam_game.last_modified, event_game.requested_at, event_game.last_modified, self_votes.vote

3a39bed2206124e4a4eb67bcbb45ece7fb0fd2e8.query: INSERT INTO steam_game_update DEFAULT VALUES RETURNING id, update_time

606228d019a84631f0c265c427cb4143728f2c67.query:
SELECT id, created_at, last_modified, title, description, time_begin, time_end
        FROM event
        WHERE id IN (
            SELECT event_id
            FROM invitation
            WHERE email = $1
        )

6cd5517472dbc53e0bcf8450e0ca65a5627de9d8.query:
SELECT event_id, email, 'https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/' || MD5(LOWER(email)) || '?d=robohash' AS avatar_url, handle, invited_at, responded_at, response AS "response: _", attendance, last_modified
        FROM invitation
        WHERE event_id=$1

750b619063812b5dfc9bbd1dc32896f0817a6248.query:
WITH event_game_suggestion_response AS (
                    INSERT INTO event_game (event_id, game_id)
                        VALUES ($1, $2)
                        RETURNING event_id, game_id, requested_at, last_modified
                ) SELECT
                    steam_game.appid AS appid,
                    steam_game.name AS name,
                    steam_game.last_modified AS last_modified,
                    event_game_suggestion_response.requested_at AS requested_at,
                    event_game_suggestion_response.last_modified AS suggestion_last_modified,
                    'novote'::vote AS "self_vote: _",
                    0::BIGINT AS votes
                FROM event_game_suggestion_response
                INNER JOIN steam_game
                    ON event_game_suggestion_response.game_id = steam_game.appid

845f07db364ad990ef08b77c1fa27f9908d9cfd2.query: SELECT id, created_at, last_modified, title, description, time_begin, time_end FROM event WHERE id = $1

9c0b3b9a9345ca926bdd6fc5a1b8786c5801b609.query: INSERT INTO event (title, description, time_begin, time_end) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) RETURNING id, created_at, last_modified, title, description, time_begin, time_end

a3a0cdbf92eec221fe987d0ee195eaf8d0531fd0.query: SELECT id, update_time FROM steam_game_update ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 1

b85b4a819bfe37870d0f8e95b5223dca65501a88.query:
SELECT appid, name, last_modified, ts_rank_cd(to_tsvector('english', name), query, 32 /* rank/(rank+1) */) AS rank
        FROM steam_game, plainto_tsquery('english', $1) query
        WHERE query @@ to_tsvector('english', name)
        ORDER BY rank DESC
        LIMIT $2
        OFFSET $3

bf2d2ba7266cfdad227651377710d07a0fd87254.query:
INSERT INTO steam_game (appid, update_id, name, last_modified)
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)
                ON CONFLICT (appid) DO UPDATE SET update_id = $2, name = $3, last_modified = $4

cc12d44673db2dca913c6946cc5a2e2287fcfdb5.query:
UPDATE invitation
        SET handle = $1, response = $2, responded_at = NOW(), last_modified = NOW()
        WHERE event_id = $3
        AND email = $4

e3424bf6404e590011f37f6fe37042bb58d0fdf3.query:
SELECT event_id, 'https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/' || MD5(LOWER(email)) || '?d=robohash' AS avatar_url, handle, response AS "response: _", attendance, last_modified
                FROM invitation
                WHERE event_id=$1 AND response IN ('yes', 'maybe')

f1b0a2f327f2453b0bf7337143c3cdd6debd3e25.query:
SELECT id, created_at, last_modified, title, description, time_begin, time_end
        FROM event
        WHERE id IN (
            SELECT event_id
            FROM invitation
            WHERE email = $1
            AND event_id = $2
        )

fae0948b43c51b9ad9932d0b8ab9f295c4712a3f.query:
SELECT event_id, email, 'https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/' || MD5(LOWER(email)) || '?d=robohash' AS avatar_url, handle, invited_at, responded_at, response AS "response: _", attendance, last_modified
        FROM invitation
        WHERE event_id=$1 AND email=$2

ff29c7469463795918bcf875ef5157e1beafa8d7.query:
INSERT INTO invitation (event_id, email)
        VALUES ($1, $2)
        RETURNING event_id, email, 'https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/' || MD5(LOWER(email)) || '?d=robohash' AS avatar_url, handle, invited_at, responded_at, response AS "response: _", attendance, last_modified
